revised_title: Genetic Analysis of Puffing in Polytene Chromosomes of Drosophila
tldr: The article discusses the genetic analysis of puffing patterns in polytene chromosomes of Drosophila, which indicates that puffs are indicators of active genes. Mutations affecting specific puffs are classified into different categories based on their behavior in heterozygotes. The study provides insights into gene action and control in Drosophila species.
